document.full_text: women in spring dresses stood beside men in dirty jeans to sing "count your many blessings" at pleasant grove united methodist church on sunday as volunteers took a break from helping families recover from the april 27 tornado that devastated the tiny community.
document.title: tornado victims turn to faith in recovery
lines_and_colors: women in spring dresses stood beside men in dirty jeans to sing "count your many blessings" at pleasant grove united methodist church on sunday as volunteers took a break from helping families recover from the april 27 tornado that devastated the tiny community.
